text: niyata vaśayenma obagē deviyan taman kæmati ayaṭa væḍi væḍiyen vistīraṇa kara dennēya. (taman kæmati ayaṭa hakuḷuvā aḍu kara) sīmā sahitavada dennēya. mandayat niyata vaśayenma ohu tama vahalūngē (gatiguṇa) hon̆din danneku vaśayenda, avadhānayen yutuva balanneku vaśayenda siṭinnēya. (ebævin sǣma keneku-gēma tatvayaṭa sarilana sē labā dennēya)
